item.title: My Beekeeping Adventure, Part 1
item.description: Collecting and Installing a Nuc (Nucleus) Colony This is the part one of a series of videos where I’m following my dad and other beekeeper friends. In this video I’m helping my friend Josh pick up his new honey bee colony (a nucleus hive) and install it in an empty hive in his backyard.
